title: Ballistic Missile Launch Threat Assessment
description: An operator at a strategic command center must assess a detected ballistic missile launch to determine its trajectory and intended target.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the launch alert from space-based infrared sensors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms the launch detection and its point of origin.

tasks.description: Fuse tracking data from multiple radar systems to calculate the missile's trajectory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator generates a precise trajectory and predicted impact point.

tasks.description: Issue a high-priority warning to leadership and downstream missile defense units with the target information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator disseminates a timely and accurate warning message.
